info.name: Gab Dark
info.description: This is dark theme for gab.ai. The wide option can be selected by using the advance tab below. Contact @MojoRisen https://gab.ai/MojoRisen
info.additionalInfo:
Patch Notes
05/06/2017
-Fix White notification area.
-Fix Display problems in Gab TV.
-Fix Profile page border gaps.
-Fix Reply white box.
-Fix Popular Tab endless box.
06/06/2017
-Fix Translate box border color.
-Fix URL box sizes on popular tab.
-Added Support for low resolution/mobile site.
-Added Custom scroll bars. Note: only works on browsers that support -webkit-scrollbar.
-Added Wide screen advance settings.
13/06/2017
-Fix Updated the css to support site updates.
05/09/2017
-Fix General appearance due to updates
-Added CSS submited by 2E0PGS https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/59244/my-improvements-for-this-great-theme
07/09/2017
-Fix the index/login page.
17/09/2017
-Fix general appearance updates.
23/09/2017
-Fix general appearance updates.
23/10/2017
-Fix Appearance changes after GAB site update.
-Fix general appearance updates.
24/10/2017
-Fix general appearance updates.
11/11/2017
-Fix Gab TV upload video pop up window.
12/9/2017
-Fix Updated to work with gab direct message.
12/16/2017
-Fix general appearance updates.

data.title: My improvements for this great theme
